events.message: I reported a car accident that occurred yesterday morning involving my vehicle and another driver at the intersection.
The claim has been categorised as an auto accident related incident and assigned the proper classification codes.
An agent has been assigned to your case to assist with the processing and further investigation of the vehicle collision claim.
Your auto accident claim has been acknowledged and is now under review by our claims department.
Please submit the police report, photos of the damage to your vehicle, and your insurance policy documents for further assessment.
All requested documents, including the police report and vehicle photos, have been submitted successfully for your auto accident claim.
Our claims investigation team has started reviewing the circumstances and supporting documents related to your vehicle collision.
The accident investigation is complete, and all relevant data has been analyzed to determine fault and claim validity.
A settlement proposal has been prepared and sent to you outlining the compensation for damages to your vehicle.
We have received your response confirming acceptance of the proposed settlement offer for your car accident claim.
Your claim has been approved based on the investigation and your agreement to the settlement terms.
The agreed settlement payment has been processed and issued to your designated bank account.
Your auto accident claim is now officially closed. Thank you for your cooperation throughout the process.
The details and documents related to your closed vehicle collision claim have been archived for future reference.
